description:
Sept 5-7: Banff Trail to University (Single Tracking)

These stations will NOT be fully closed, this is a partial closure.

The southbound track will be closed at Banff Trail and University stations for maintenance work starting at 8:15 p.m. on Friday, September 5 until the early hours of Monday, September 8.

For more information please visit calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service
